message:
SYSTEM: KGEOntologies_2021.pdf: Página 34
An Ontology-Based Deep Learning Approach for Triple Classification with Out-of-Knowledge-Base Entities
Conclusions
34
The proposed method, despite its simplicity, can help
classical KGE models to progress at least in the triple 
classification task in the standard benchmarks. 
By using a proper initialization, KGE models also
converge much faster to their optimal solution
The proposed initialization enables triple 
classification over OOKB entities while being
computationally inexpensive and easy to implement
alongside any KGE model.
speaker: SYSTEM
